snippet.title: Ruby's REBALANCED Halo CE Mod!
snippet.description:
[ SEE NEWEST VERSION OF THIS MOD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BGmZWccoM-o ]

A modded Halo CE Campaign that makes various balancing tweaks to make the game as close to perfect as possible. From weapons, vehicles, AI, some encounter tweaks and more.

PATREON ►: https://www.patreon.com/RubyofBlue
TWITCH  ►: https://www.twitch.tv/ruby_of_blue
TWITTER ►: https://twitter.com/RubyofBlue
DISCORD ►: https://discord.gg/NYg5cGy

DOWNLOAD FOR MASTER CHIEF COLLECTION:
STEAM WORKSHOP ►: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2915693904
NEXUS ►: https://www.nexusmods.com/halothemasterchiefcollection/mods/292

DOWNLOAD FOR CUSTOM EDITION:
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1R5UWUMFIkW-45n-eUVElMZx9aTZu00UX

Halo Combat Evolved Refined:
https://www.reddit.com/r/HaloCERefined/comments/9lpf14/halo_combat_evolved_refined/

Halo Custom Edition:
http://hce.halomaps.org/?fid=410

Other helpful downloads for Halo CE:
Halo Mouse Tool: https://github.com/AWilliams17/Halo-CE-Mouse-Tool/releases
OpenSauce: http://www.halomods.com/ips/index.php?/topic/848-opensauce-v400-release/

CHANGE LIST:
https://bit.ly/30EBKZl

#halo #halomods #halocerebalanced
